Name: Power Strike
Description: A devastating strike that deals extra damage.

Abilities.Name: Power Strike
Abilities.Effect: Attack 1 creature within 1 space. The attack can use any weapon you have, but the damage dice is increased to 1d12 if the weapon's damage is less than that.

Name: Shield Wall
Description: Defensive stance to protect nearby allies.

Abilities.Name: Shield Wall
Abilities.Effect: Allies within 1 space of you add +1 to their defense rolls.
